name: Harajuku SENTOU Cafe
description:
Saizo Kirigakure has traveled back in time to the present day and is searching for the key person in the story.

Since he did not meet any key person at the casino, he headed to Japan this time.

...This is Harajuku, Japan.
Saizo stumbles upon a strange store where he can have tea in a "sento" (public bath), which is a part of Japanese culture.

Upon entering the store, Saizo was greeted by a kunoichi with an appearance he had never seen before.

Saizo thinks that he is a time traveler like himself and wants to have a fight with him.
However, she was apparently unaccustomed to fighting, and instead of attacking me at all, she spoke to me in a friendly manner.

At first, Saizo suspected that it was a sorcery of the white one.
She calls herself "Harajuku Decora Kunoichi" and says she is a modern fashion leader.

She taught him a lot of things about modern Japan as they exchanged words such as, "It's easy to find you when you're hiding in such fancy clothes.”

He be able to meet the key person?
And who are the key person?

Just then, He received a message from Hattori Hanzo!
